events
Class VSRegisteredEvents

java.lang.Object
  events.VSRegisteredEvents

public final class VSRegisteredEvents
extends java.lang.Object

The class VSRegisteredEvents. This class is responsible to manage all events. It manages the event classnames, the event shortnames and the event names. It also checks if a protocol (which is an event as well) has variables which are editable through the GUI of the simulator.

Author:
Paul C. Buetow
